caption: A man was speaking affectionately and quietly to a woman, making promises. Afterward, he left, appearing content.In another place, a group of people on horseback was searching for something, but an elderly man among them was sent back. He had hoped to stay with them, but he was sent back, as the man beside him was not pleased with him.A woman entered a room and discovered that her servant had been killed. She was filled with anger and grief. Another man hurriedly came over, and the woman recounted the incident to him. He saw the man responsible and seemed pleased with his actions.On a snow-covered mountainside, a female captive was held by a man. They were walking, and as the woman spoke, she suddenly tripped the man and made a run for it.
